text: Agathonas Iakovidis (; 2 January 1955 â€“ 5 August 2020) was a Greek folk singer and musician. He represented Greece in the Eurovision Song Contest 2013 with Koza Mostra and the song "Alcohol Is Free". He was born in Langadas, Thessaloniki. His career began in 1971. On 5 August 2020, Iakovidis died from a heart attack at his Athens home, aged 65.Greek Rebetiko Musician Agathonas Iakovidis Passes Away at Age 65 ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Greek singers Category:Folk singers Category:Folk musicians Category:Guitarists Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants
title: Agathonas Iakovidis
